stories.title: DBreeze – embedded C# .NET NOSQL key value multi-paradigm database system

stories.text:
I recently received an invite to join "Google Play's developer research community". Does anyone know anything about this? Given that they incentivize participation through gift cards, it doesn't exactly sound like a "high-quality" community:

This is an invite-only community of professionals from apps and games businesses. As a community member, you will:

- Influence Google leadership teams and what we’re working on here at Google by sharing your thoughts and feedback.

- Connect with other industry professionals to exchange stories, advice, and challenges.

- Receive gift certificates as a reward for your participation.

If you’re interested in joining Apps Community Insights, click below to answer a short survey to see if you qualify.
stories.title: Ask HN: Google Play's developer research community
Forrest pursues gravity-charged electric train to shift his iron ore

Kyiv transport app is transformed into life-saving war information tool

stories.text:
These two young people, Avi Schiffmann and Marco Burstein, students at Harvard, in just three days have developed and launched the website https://www.ukrainetakeshelter.com/ , a website in 12 languages where Ukrainian refugees fleeing war can immediately find hosts with free rooms, apartments unused in resorts, big or small cities or school dorms. Pass this information to other Ukrainians, who are now in European countries and not only, but also to those who would like to be a host to these people in need.

#pace #peace #ukraine #refugees
